meanings.definition: A group of neighboring genes on a chromosome that are inherited together
meanings.sent1: The supergene on the chromosome determines the color of the flower.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the supergene to understand how traits are passed down.
meanings.sent3: The supergene on the chromosome threw a party for all the neighboring genes.
meanings.sent4: The supergene acted like a traffic conductor, ensuring all genes in the group were inherited together.
meanings.sent5: In the genetic world, the supergene was the leader of the gene neighborhood.

meanings.definition: A gene that controls the expression of other genes in a coordinated manner
meanings.sent1: The supergene regulated the activity of the surrounding genes.
meanings.sent2: Researchers discovered a supergene that influenced the growth of the plant.
meanings.sent3: The supergene organized a gene dance party, making sure all genes moved in sync.
meanings.sent4: Like a conductor, the supergene orchestrated the gene orchestra with precision.
meanings.sent5: The supergene was the maestro of genetic harmony among the genes.
